verbs.description: Cash registers [V: are] ringing in Singapore as businesses take advantage of the hype around the Trump - Kim summit .
[ARG1: Cash registers] are [V: ringing] [ARGM-LOC: in Singapore] [ARGM-TMP: as businesses take advantage of the hype around the Trump - Kim summit] .
Cash registers are ringing in Singapore as [ARG0: businesses] [V: take] [ARG1: advantage] [ARG2: of the hype around the Trump - Kim summit] .
